mapper.select: SELECT C.CERTIFICATION_ID AS CERTIFICATION_ID , C.CREATED_BY AS CREATED_BY , C.COMMENT AS COMMENT , C.IMAGE_URL AS IMAGE_URL , C.CREATED_DATE AS CREATED_DATE , DATE(C.CREATED_DATE) AS certDate , C.CREATED_BY AS userId, , C.LIKE_COUNT AS LIKE_COUNT , U.NICKNAME AS NICKNAME , U.LEVEL AS LEVEL (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CERT_COMMENT CC WHERE CC.CERTIFICATION_ID = C.CERTIFICATION_ID) as commentCount FROM CERTIFICATION C INNER JOIN PARTICIPATION P ON C.PARTICIPATION_ID = P.PARTICIPATION_ID INNER JOIN USER U ON C.CREATED_BY = U.USER_ID WHERE P.CHALLENGE_ID = #{challengeId} ORDER BY C.CREATED_DATE DESC

SELECT C.CERTIFICATION_ID AS CERTIFICATION_ID , C.CREATED_BY AS CREATED_BY , C.COMMENT AS COMMENT , C.IMAGE_URL AS IMAGE_URL , C.CREATED_DATE AS CREATED_DATE , C.LIKE_COUNT AS LIKE_COUNT , U.NICKNAME AS NICKNAME , U.LEVEL AS LEVEL FROM CERTIFICATION C JOIN PARTICIPATION P ON C.PARTICIPATION_ID = P.PARTICIPATION_ID JOIN USER U ON C.CREATED_BY = U.USER_ID WHERE C.CERTIFICATION_ID = #{certificationId} ORDER BY C.CREATED_DATE DESC
